DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : AMMAN ; CLINTON IN MIDEAST
DOC.TEXT: President Clinton will arrive in Amman , Jordan , Wednesday to witness the signing of the historic peace accord between Israel and Jordan , another step_in the Mideast peace process that began with the agreement between Israel and the Palestine Liberation Organization signed_in Washington last year . The second step of the ambitious mission will send the American president to Damascus , Syria , on Thursday for talks with President Hafez Assad and other leaders of Israel ' s most intransigent enemy.Peace talks between Damascus and Jerusalem are stalemated . Later that day , the American leader will go_to Jerusalem and make an address to the Israeli Parliament . He is expected to applaud the Israeli leadership for taking risks for peace , and is likely to face vocal opposition from political rightists .
